Original: What the hell!? I thought I'd go and
see Yggdrasil, and after a solid year
on the road, I finally get here...
[Page]
Only to find that it's withered away!
Just when I was about to go register
at the Explorers Guild, too!
[Page]
What am I supposed to do now...?
Translation: What the hell!? I thought I'd go and
see Yggdrasil, and after a solid year
on the road, I finally get here...
[Page]
Only to find that it's withered away!
Just when I was about to go register
at the Explorers Guild, too!
[Page]
What am I supposed to do now...?

Original: What the hell!? With Yggdrasil all
withered away, I had my things packed
and ready to go back home...
[Page]
Only for it to grow right back! I'd
already written my fiancee to tell
her I'd be coming home...
[Page]
Hmph. Guess it's just the way things
go. At least now, I'll be one of the
first to get there...
[Page]
Sorry, Ellie. The ceremony will be
on hold a little longer... I've found
my calling.
